PlantwiseSimulator module

class src.vLab.IntegratedBioprocess.PlantwiseSimulator.PlantwiseSimulator(bioreactor_param=None, chromatography_param=None, solver_name='julia', method='CVODE_BDF')[source]

Bases: vLab.IntegratedBioprocess.ODESolver.BaseOdeSolver

This is the simulator for end-to-end bioprocess. It currently can be used to

  • Simulate integrated perfusion bioreactor and chromatograph purification.

  • Conduct long-term predictive analysis, e.g., how the feeding strategy at different times of bioreactor impact on the trajectory and variation of integrated biomanufacturing processes.

  • Find the optimal and robust control strategies for this integrated process.

Parameters

  • bioreactor_param (CellCultureModel) – bioreactor parameters

  • chromatography_param (ChromatographyModel) – chromatography parameters

  • solver_name (str) – use either julia or python

  • method (str) – integration method to use.

solve(init_state, time_interval=None, process_time=None, flow=None, inlet=None)[source]

Solve the plantwise simulation

Parameters

  • time_interval – start and end time of simulation

  • init_state (array) – initial state

  • process_time (array) – bioprocess time (h) for unit operations

  • flow (array) – flow rates (L/h)

  • inlet – inlet concentrations (g/L) in each unit operation

Return ODESolution sol

solution of plantwise simulation
